translations: n.归寡妇所得的亡夫遗产的三分之一；（商品的）三等品

sentences.sentence: Two thirds of the region has been deforested in the past decade.
sentences.translation: 在过去十年里这个地区的森林有三分之二被毁掉。

sentences.sentence: About two-thirds of adults consult their doctor at least once a year.
sentences.translation: 大约三分之二的成年人一年至少看一次医生。

sentences.sentence: A two thirds majority is needed to make changes.
sentences.translation: 需要2/3的多数人同意才能做改变。
